snippet: Fox Sports agreed to a 12-year deal to carry the Open starting in 2015 on both its broadcast network and Fox Sports 1, a cable network that starts this month.
abstract: Fox Sports agrees to a 12-year deal to carry the United States Open golf tournament starting in 2015 on both its broadcast network and Fox Sports 1, new cable network.
lead_paragraph: Fox Sports agreed to a 12-year deal to carry the Open starting in 2015 on both its broadcast network and Fox Sports 1, a cable network that starts this month.

headline.main: Adding Golf to Its Lineup, Fox Sports Acquires Rights to United States Open
headline.print_headline: Fox Gets Into Golf Business With U.S. Open
